programme.title: Christian Scott - The Centennial Trilogy
programme.desc: In just a few years, young trumpet player Christian Scott has become synonymous with a new jazz generation. He shakes up the conventions of jazz by taking the genre to new horizons and reaching a wider audience. No doubt, at 33 years old, Christian Scott is already forging his own path. After each record release, he seems even more determined to challenge the rules of jazz with his own avant-garde style. At his 2018 show at La Cooperative de Mai, Christian Scott celebrates 100 years of jazz with the program "The Centennial Trilogy." Expect a unique performance in an intimate theatre setting, shot in native 4K!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Non Stop Travels
programme.sub-title: Non Stop Travels: The Story of Michel Petrucciani
programme.desc: This film portrays Michel Petrucciani s very unique outlook on life, his vitality, boisterous humor and marked comedian talent which triumphes over all physical restrictions. It also shows Michel Petrucciani performing, composing, selecting his very own piano, at a recording session with Stephane Grapelli, Roy Haynes and Georges Mraz, .... and much more.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is the French reed player duo NoSax NoClar. The intense bickering of Bastien Weegers saxophones and Stella Juliens clarinet embodies the intimate relationship of two reed instruments in their exploration of free jazz and free-form music.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Canadian singer and bandleader Dominique Fils-Aime. Her ethereal yet powerful vocals are paired with a tight-knit band to deliver a fresh take on jazz and blues with hints of RandB and free improvisation. Her single "Feeling Like a Plant" serves as a sign of great things to come.

programme.title: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. Trumpeter Carlo Nardozza and pianist Michel Bisceglia combine their talents to create wonderful music with haunting melodies and beautiful themes. The Belgian musicians, with Italian roots, have joined forces on several projects during the last few years. This MotorMusic session reflects the combination of two different identities and the beautiful blend of an intimate collaboration between piano and trumpet.

programme.title: Eartha Kitt
programme.sub-title: Eartha Kitt: The Most Exciting Woman in the World
programme.desc: They called her "the most exciting woman in the world", and this Afro-American voice lived up to this expectation with international flair. Eartha Kitt was one of the reigning queens of blues and jazz. She epitomized the idea of the sex-kitten chanteuse, rising to fame with a nightclub act centered on her slinky stage presence and throaty purr. As much as she enjoyed vamping it up, Kitt also projected the image of an exotic international sophisticate, singing in several languages.

programme.title: Matteo Myderwyk - InJazz 2019
programme.desc: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what theyre capable of. One of the artists performing at inJazz is Matteo Myderwyk. Myderwyk is a 28-year-old Amsterdam-based pianist. He completed his master degree in piano classical and improvised music at Fontys Conservatorium Tilburg in the Netherlands and took classes from established masters such as Harmen Fraanje, Rembrandt Frerichs and Jeroen van Vliet.

programme.title: Greatest Lady Vocalists 4:3
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest lady vocalists of all time are featured in this superb compilation. These historic recordings from the 1950s and 1960s offer a unique overview of different approaches to jazz singing that helped define the genre. Watch Billie Holidays performance of "God Bless The Child" closely and learn what made her such an influential jazz and pop singer. Enjoy Anita ODays matchless rhythmic sense in a performance of "Honeysuckle Rose" recorded at the Arenateatern in Stockholm, Sweden on November 1, 1963. Marvel at Nina Simones December 1968 performance of "Aint Got No, I Got Life" from London. Let Sarah Vaughans rendition of "Tenderly" sweep you off your feet - Sassy, or The Divine One, recorded this romantic evergreen in a television studio in Sweden on July 9, 1958. Last but not least, revel at the First Lady of Song: Ella Fitzgerald swung "Mack The Knife" in a December 4, 1960 appearance at The Embers in suburban Melbourne, Australia. Get to know the greatest lady vocalists in jazz history with this unique compilation of historic recordings!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1987, smooth jazz saxophonist and crowd-favorite Kenny G serenaded those attending the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. After beginning his career in the Love Unlimited Orchestra, he now brings his own band for this hypnotic performance.

programme.title: Louis Armstrong
programme.desc: Following a highly successful small-group jazz concert at New York Town Hall on May 17, 1947, Armstrongs manager Joe Glaser dissolved the Armstrong big band on August 13, 1947 and established a six-piece small group. This group was called the All Stars, and in 1964 Louis Armstrong recorded his biggest-selling record, Hello, Dolly! He made assorted television appearances, especially in the 1950s and 1960s - the recorded film was a TV Show in Australia when Armstrong was at the peak of his career. Armstrong kept up his busy tour schedule until a few years before his death in 1971. He also toured Africa, Europe, and Asia under sponsorship of the US State Department with great success, earning the nickname Ambassador Satch.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: Legendary African-American folk singer Odetta (1930-2008) sang her spirituals with immeasurable sorrow and anguish. Her spiritual music expresses the horrific impact of slavery on millions of African people stolen from their homeland. For Odetta, folk music—be it spirituals, blues or field songs—was a vehicle for expressing the racism and injustice experienced by black people dating back to the days of slavery. This 1964 episode of Face au Public shows the melancholy of the era.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Kim Hoorweg at BIRD, Rotterdam
programme.desc: After Dutch singer Kim Hoorweg landed her first record contract from Universal Music at the age of 14, her musical career took off and she became a well-known name in the Netherlands jazz community. Famous artists such as Candy Dulfer, Raul Midon, Metropole Orkest, and Gino Vannelli, to name a few, have already performed with the singer on numerous occasions. This time, Kim Hoorweg performs at BIRD in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, together with fellow Dutch musicians Anton Goudsmit on guitar, Niels Broos on keyboards, and Yoran Vroom on drums.

programme.title: Teus Nobel live at the Bimhuis
programme.sub-title: Teus Nobel live at the Bimhuis: Legacy
programme.desc: Teus Nobel is a Dutch trumpet and flugelhorn player. As a little boy, he was inspired by "power" trumpeters such as Maynard Ferguson and Bill Chase. While studying at the conservatory, he played both as jazz player and as a commercial session musician at musicals. After his time at the conservatory, he started playing in the Royal Netherlands Air Force Orchestra, playing march music influenced by pop and jazz. Todays broadcast was recorded at the Amsterdam BIMhuis. Teus dedicates his compositions to his all-time heroes Jarmo Hoogendijk, Woody Shaw, Christian Scott, Roy Hargrove and Eric Vloeimans. This performance is based on his second album Legacy.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Belgian-Japanese piano wizard Alex Koo. In his brand new Etudes for Piano, composed for and commissioned by BOZAR Brussels, he shows how his passion for jazz and classical music merge perfectly, like a marriage between Debussy, Chopin, Reich, and Rachmaninov on the one hand, and Keith Jarrett, Craig Taborn, Brian Eno, and Philip Glass on the other.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1982, The Jazztet, a legendary hard-bop sextet founded by trumpeter Art Farmer and saxophonist Benny Golson, reunited after a twenty-year separation at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. They are joined by original member Curtis Fuller on trombone and newcomers Rufus Reid on bass, Mickey Tucker on piano and Albert Heath on drums.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Tim Kliphuis and the NCO
programme.sub-title: Tim Kliphuis and the NCO: The Changing Seasons
programme.desc: The Netherlands Chamber Orchestra commissioned violinist Tim Kliphuis, internationally known for his genre-crossing approach to music, to write a new version of Antonio Vivaldis Four Seasons. Kliphuis choose to take improvisation as his starting point; at the same time, he intended to leave the best-known Vivaldi themes and chords in, as they give the piece its wonderful energy. The result is a fresh and exciting interpretation that never loses sight of the original. Each season has a different character: the freshness of spring is reflected by the use of Irish and Norwegian traditional music; the summer heat can be heard in the American jazz and funk rhythms; the autumn includes a galloping safari hunt in South-Africa and the ice-cold winter warms up with the energy of Russian gypsy music. For each movement, Kliphuis has a metropole in mind which he visited on his previous concert tours. Youre about to witness a truly genre-crossing spectacle!

programme.title: The Blue Note Masters
programme.desc: Ron Carter, Bobby Hutcherson and Joe Chambers are legends of Blue Note Records. They have established themselves as forward-thinking and inventive band leaders, composers and studio musicians, astonishing audiences around the world with their creativity and technical versatility.

programme.title: BIRDtv
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe, and restaurant with a live music program thats deeply rooted in jazz, soul, funk, hip-hop, and electronic. Its name BIRD refers to the nickname of legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker. BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, fine wines, no-nonsense beers, and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programs: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from a first-row seat! This episode is dedicated to seven brothers from the south side of Chicago: The Hypnotic Brass Ensemble AKA Bad Boys of Jazz, Tha Bros, and Yo Favorite Band! The band freely adds generous doses of hip-hop, soul, and funk to the brass band tradition, creating an intoxicating and boisterous blend: perfect for another episode of BIRD.tv!

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was born in the 1920s, when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Entitled "World Music", this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Teofilo Chantre, Tiwitine, Kinsy Ray, and many others.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: The Art of Duo
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. "The Art of Duo" presents an unprecedented duo featuring pianist Salman Gambarov and sheng player, a Chinese mouth-organ, Wu Wei.

programme.title: Oum - Music Meeting Festival 2018
programme.desc: Oum El Ghait Benessahraoui, who is better known as Oum, gives a unique glance at ethnic Morrocan musical esthetics. The singer-songwriter is considered to be the ambassador of Morrocan culture, too. Deeply influenced by gospel, jazz, soul and RandB genres, today Oum mixes more and more African music genres, such as Sufi, Hassani, or Afrobeat. Yet, the singers voice still echoes the colours of Aretha Franklin, Ella Fitzgerald or Whitney Houston. It is the African American vocal tradition that made a huge impact on Oum since her early days as the singer. Performing from Music Meeting Festival in Nijmegen, The Netherlands, Oum charms the stage with an exotic sonic journey to the undiscovered lands of North Africa.

programme.title: Charlie Parker - Bird with Strings Revisited
programme.desc: In the late 1940s, jazz saxophonist Charlie "Bird" Parker expressed his wish to record with a classical string section rather than his usual jazz quintet. This desire was fulfilled in 1949 and 1950 when he recorded two albums with oboe, harp, string section and a jazz rhythm section, released as Charlie Parker with Strings. Fast forward 70 years, when saxophonists Olivier Boge, Geraldine Laurent, Pierrick Pedron, Thomas de Pourquery, and Jaleel Shaw follow in the jazz legends footsteps, revisiting the repertoire of those original albums in this 2019 concert at The Philharmonie de Paris. Bastien Stil conducts Christophe Dal Sassos new orchestral arrangements in this genre-blending concert, which opens with Dal Sassos very own Overture pour cinq saxophones et orchestra.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Earl Hines Quartet in Spa, 1977
programme.desc: Despite his advanced age, the legendary jazz pianist Earl Hines was at the top of his game when he performed in the Belgian town of Spa in 1977. With a band consisting of Rudy Rutherford (reeds), Jimmy Leary (bass), and Eddie Graham (drums), Hines livens up the room with his interpretations of "I Cant Believe That Youre In Love With Me" and "The Man I Love." Marva Josie joins the group for soulful renditions of "A Sunday Kind of Love" and the well-known classic "Kansas City" before the set comes to a close with "Caravan," which features a lengthy drum solo by Graham.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Ryan Porter and The West Coast Get Down - BIRD
programme.desc: Los Angeles-born saxophonist Kamasi Washington and trombonist Ryan Porter co-founded West Coast Get Down - a musical collective fusing jazz and funk with hip-hop. It is partly because of this collective that jazz saw a resurgence in Los Angeles, subtly eclipsing the long-established jazz mecca of the world, New York City. The two musicians join forces and take the vibes of Los Angeles to jazz club BIRD in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Salif Keita and Les Ambassadeurs
programme.desc: Salif Keitas music is a rich combination of traditional Malian music with European and American influences. We can hear this in the instrumentation of Keitas music, which varies from traditional West-African instruments to Western European ones. The Malian singer was cast out by his family because of his albinism. In 1967 he moved to Bamako, where he started his musical career and joined Les Ambassadeurs (Internationaux). He achieved international acknowledgement with this band in the 1970s. After spending a couple of years in Ivory Coast, Salif has found his home base in Paris since 1984. During this 2010 concert, he proves to be rightfully referred to as "The Golden Voice of Africa".

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Bakolo Music International, represents the pioneers of the golden age of Congolese rumba. The singer, guitarist and grand survivor Nzofu Moko Buele, known to all as Bikunda, is carrying on a torch first lit in 1948 by "Papa" Wend Kolosoy, the "father of Congolese Rumba" and composer of the first Rumba hit song, Marie-Louise.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts. Due to COVID-19, only half of the scheduled performances of the 2021 edition were actually recorded in Bremen. Among the performing bands is Berlin People, a Berlin-based jazz ensemble that was founded in 2018. Saxophonist Tobias Meinhart brought together three of his long-time German peers (pianist Ludwig Hornung, bassist Tom Berkmann, and drummer Mathias Ruppnig) for recordings with the American jazz guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. Their core sound is based on experimental improvisation, combining the American jazz tradition and the European approach. Each band member brings in their personal experiences to explore different sonic rivers.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Polish violinist Amalia "Umeda" Obrębowska with her quartet. The Amalia Umeda Quartets sound can be described as a fusion between contemporary, experimental jazz, and traditional Slavic music, which is sure to make an impact on the international music scene.

programme.title: Bilal - Moods
programme.desc: American neo-soul singer Bilal Sayeed Oliver, generally known as Bilal, studied at New Yorks New School for Jazz and Contemporary Music, where he received both voice training and training in jazz and big-band arrangements. He has since worked with the likes of Erykah Badu, Robert Glasper, and Kendrick Lamar. In this concert from Jazz Club Moods in Zurich, Switzerland, Bilal is accompanied by Randall Runyon (guitar), Conley Whitfield (bass), and Joseph Grisette (drums).

programme.title: Carla Bley Sextet live at Estival Lugano 1986
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Discover the special bond between pianist Carla Bley and bassist Steve Swallow. The two have performed in the same bands since the 60s and have been romantic partners for more than two decades. Watching them perform is the definition of musical telepathy. Together with musicians Wayne Krantz, Victor Lewis, Larry Willis, and Don Alias, they form an amazing sextet at Estival in 1986.

programme.title: Jeff Moran and Thomas Carbou live à Quebec
programme.desc: Thomas Carbou and Jeff Moran share an almost telepathic rapport, blending spontaneous improvisation, electronic looping, and Brazilian and Indian musical influences to create ecstatic groove pieces and dream-like soundscapes. They use a wide array of instruments, including a custom-built 8-string guitar, cuatro, bouzouki, cajon, frame drums, berimbau, udu, and metal percussion instruments, as well as samplers and laptops, adding their own hypnotic vocals to the mix.

programme.title: LoLanders - InJazz
programme.desc: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what theyre capable of. One of the bands performing at inJazz is LoLanders, six musical friends and individuals who play inspired new music that combines the passion and traditions of Scotland and the Highlands with an Asian sensibility and the cool wit and invention of the Netherlands finest.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the amazing Dutch jazzband BRUUT led by saxophone player Maarten Hoogenhuis!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Saluzzi, Mariano and Dauner live in Stuttgart
programme.desc: Dino Saluzzi, one of Argentinas tango music masters, has been building his legacy since the mid-1980s. His accordion-like bandoneon defines Argentinas tango music. Saluzzi has explored many paths—paths along which he has rarely travelled more than once, despite some common threads. This rare, vibrant and intense performance is an intimate collaboration with Charlie Mariano (saxophone) and Wolfgang Dauner (piano) and features music ranging from tango and classical music to international favorites.

programme.title: Artvark Saxophone Quartet and Ntjam Rosie
programme.sub-title: Artvark Saxophone Quartet and Ntjam Rosie: Homelands
programme.desc: Homelands is a collaboration between Artvark Saxophone Quartet and Cameroonian-Dutch singer Ntjam Rosie. The music is inspired by both traditional and modern music from Ntjams home country Cameroon, (Manu Dibango and Richard Bona) as well as by an Afro-European blend of soul, jazz, gospel and world music. Using unorthodox sounds as the basis of their compositions, Artvark continues to be radical, experimenting with alternative ways of playing the sax. For this project, they explore the world of electronics and effects to create new sounds. Ntjams role is divers. She is the quartets fifth instrument, recites spoken word, plays (vocal) percussion, forms duos or trios with the saxophones and accompanies the quartet on her guitar. She performs texts in English as well as in French, one of Cameroons official languages, and sings in Bulu, her mother tongue.

programme.title: SHYRE live at Festival Vue sur la Relève
programme.desc: SHYRE is the creative collaboration launched by Montreal-born vocalist and pianist Sarah Rossy. This five-member group mixes instrumental textures with ethereal ambience, taking the listener on a journey through passages of prose with unique aesthetics. SHYRE fuses pop-folk and jazz with symphonic timbres, and psychedelic ambience, employing lush strings, dynamic rhythms, and angelic harmonies. The resulting soundscape is innocent, yet fascinating. Sail away on the aural wings of music from their debut album New Year (2013).

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Charles Bradley
programme.sub-title: Charles Bradley: The Screaming Eagle of Soul
programme.desc: This concert of soul singer Charles Bradley (1948-2017) was recorded in an intimate setting in Paris in September 2014. Before considering a career in music, Bradley had long tried to make ends meet with a series of small jobs. It was only in 1996 that he finally followed in the footsteps of his idol and soul icon James Brown, with whom he shared an exceptional ability to bring audiences to ecstasy. Bradley has developed a unique sound that combines funk, soul, and RandB, but still tinged with Brown influences.

programme.title: Duke Ellington Orchestra - Het Concertgebouw
programme.desc: The Royal Concertgebouw in Amsterdam is a world-renowned concert hall, known for its first-rate acoustics. It has attracted many famous performers over the years and is one of the Netherlands most treasured musical institutions. On November 2, 1958, American jazz titan Duke Ellington and his Orchestra performed two concerts at the Concertgebouw in Amsterdam. Among the many talents in the Orchestra were trumpeter Clark Terry, trombonist Quentin Jackson, saxophonist Johnny Hodges and violinist Ray Nance.

programme.title: BIRDtv
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe and restaurant with a live music programme thats deeply rooted in jazz, and also branches out towards soul, funk, hip-hop and electronic music as well. Its name "BIRD" refers to the nickname of the legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker (1920-1955). BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, good wines, no-nonsense beers and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programmes: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from the first row! This episode is a fantastic registration of the after party of the North Sea Jazz Festival: Boogieball. This mega jam session is a great coming together of, amongst others, bassist Bootsy Collins, guitarist Flávio Silva, and drummer/vocalist Sheila E.

programme.title: Tony Bennett
programme.desc: Relive the magic of one of the most beloved crooners in music history in his prime: Tony Bennett! Recorded live in Londons Royal Albert Hall on March 2, 1974, this enchanting performance showcases Bennetts remarkable vocal prowess and charisma to full effect. Bennett is accompanied by his musical director Torrie Zito and an orchestra of British musicians that includes Kenny Clare (drums), Don Lusher (trombone), and Kenny Baker (trumpet). Tune in for Bennetts captivating take on songs "The Good Things in Life", "My Favorite Things", "My Love", "Ive Got Five Dollars", "It Dont Mean a Thing", and "Maybe This Time" in this magical concert recording.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Herbie Man and Sonny Sharrock - Memphis underground
programme.desc: This selection of unforgettable performances by some of the most iconic and influential jazz guitarists in history showcases these legends unique essence. Revel in Wes Montgomerys virtuosity as he performs the captivating "Nicas Dream" in Holland in 1965, and delight in the expressive beauty of his rendition of "Heres That Rainy Day", recorded in London in that same year. Experience the timeless appeal of Joe Passs "You Stepped Out of a Dream" and "You Turned The Tables on Me", recorded live in Hanover in 1975. The interplay between Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller borders on the impossible as they perform "Extensions" in Hanover in 1973. Enjoy Jim Halls lyrical solo performance of "Im Getting Sentimental Over You" from 1964. Witness Sonny Sharrocks avant-garde fusion of jazz and rock in an exhilarating performance of "Peanut", recorded live in France in 1970. Sharrock is joined by flutist Herbie Mann in a soulful performance of "Memphis Underground" from 1969. Immerse yourself in the magic of jazz guitar!

programme.title: Charles Lloyd Quartet live in Brussels
programme.desc: Since 1960, the legendary saxophonist Charles Lloyd has lent his adventurous, lyrical sound to collaborations with likes of Cannonball Adderley, Keith Jarrett and The Beach Boys. His early and highly successful experiments blending jazz and rock music charted a path that led to the electric fusion of Miles Davis and The Headhunters, while his exploration of spirituality and transcendental meditation added a new depth to his sound. Lloyd moves from hard swing to subtle ballads, blending gorgeous textures and Eastern influences. This 1966 recording features Lloyds quartet, accompanied by Keith Jarrett (piano), Cecil McBee (double bass) and Jack DeJohnette (drums), playing some of Lloyds own compositions.

programme.title: Stingray PausePlay
programme.desc: We Pause and chat with local and international artists to get an in-depth look at their lives and music, they Play some amazing music in these, one-of-a-kind, live sessions! These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the American saxophone player James Brandon Lewis.

programme.title: American Masters
programme.desc: "The mournful expressiveness of his voice opens a window into the human heart, it is the sound of soul, a cosmic howl that cuts through emotional canvases like a hot knife through butter." These words of Yvonne Smith perfectly describe the incredible voice of Ray Charles. Charles, the man who combined blues, jazz, gospel and rhythm and blues creating the music that we now know as soul, can rightfully be called a genius. This documentary gives a unique overview of his turbulent life. Colleagues and contemporaries including David "Fathead" Newman, Dr. John, Billy Joel, Willie Nelson, Hank Crawford, Ahmet Ertegun, Jerry Wexler, Billy Preston, Merry Clayton and Ray Charles, Jr. share their first-hand experiences with Ray Charles.

programme.title: Art Blakey, Horace Silver - Newport Jazz Festival
programme.desc: The Newport Jazz Festival, first established in the North-American town of Newport, Rhode Island in the summer of 1954, has now grown to become one of the largest multi-day celebrations of jazz worldwide. It has resulted in numerous famous live albums from top-rate jazz stars, and has spawned several worldwide tours, including editions of the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. In October 1968, two former colleagues met again on stage, this time leading their own bands at the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam: drummer Art Blakey and pianist Horace Silver were both co-founders of The Jazz Messengers.

programme.title: Estival Jazz Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The composer, trumpeter and bugle player Franco Ambrosetti performs with his quintet in his native Lugano as part of the Estival.

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1986, multi-talented American guitarist John Scofield and his band performed an electrifying concert at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. First known for playing with Miles Davis, Scofield shows here that he earned that pedigree.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2024, jazzahead! paid special attention to the jazz scene of the Netherlands and invited over forty jazz acts to perform over the course of three days. Among the duos presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2024 is Sinfonia de Carnaval, composed of two exceptionally adaptable Austrian musicians: Anna Lang (cello, piano) and Alois Eberl (trombone, accordion, vocals). Their project "Sweeping Dragon" is "inspired by the nature all around us, and by places of fantasy beyond it" and blends jazz and pop with electronic sounds and a full range of classical playing techniques.

programme.title: Erroll Garner - Live in Singer Concertzaal, Laren
programme.desc: On June 18, 1962, American pianist and composer Erroll Garner performed at the Singer Concertzaal in Laren. The vibrant and joyous concert was played with drummer Kelly Martin and bassist Eddie Calhoun, each long-standing collaborators from Garners trio. The Singer Concertzaal in Laren, the Netherlands is a concert hall and museum dedicated to the preservation of the art collection of American William Henry Singer. It features a variety of artists, both visual and aural.

programme.title: Live in Sydney
programme.desc: Steven Gene Wold, commonly known as Seasick Steve, (born circa 1941) is an American bluesman, although he prefers to be called "a song and dance man". He plays guitars (mostly personalized), and sings, usually about his early life living rough and doing casual work.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: STUFF. live at BIRD Rotterdam
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe, and restaurant with a live music program thats deeply rooted in jazz, soul, funk, hip-hop, and electronic. Its name BIRD refers to the nickname of legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker. BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, fine wines, no-nonsense beers, and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programs: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from a first-row seat! Discover an irresistible live act; STUFF is full of unflagging energy. The Belgian band was founded in 2012 when drummer Lander Gyselinck was asked to play live music between DJ sets at a local bar. He gathered a bunch of friends, who also were musicians. The band could be considered an avant-garde jazz band who play a mix of funk, hip-hop, and electro. Andrew Claes (saxophone), Dries Laheye (bass guitar), Lander Gyselinck (drums), Mixmonster Menno (samples), and Joris Caluwaerts (keyboards) share an exceptional connection in music. They take over every stage and melt the hearts of music lovers.

programme.title: Visions of Music
programme.desc: Visions of Music - World Jazz invites the viewer on a journey to the roots of music, introducing the enormous impact that traditional music from around the world has had on contemporary jazz. This program features legendary musicians such as BB King, Dino Saluzzi, Tito Puente, Carlos Santana, Zawinul Joe, Manu Dibango, Abdullah Ibrahim, as well as new generation representatives such as Nicholas Payton, Cyro Baptista, and Don Byron. This episode of the Visions of Music series is about trumpet player Nicholas Payton, a dynamic performer who plays acoustic jazz and post-bop and enjoys going beyond the boundaries of traditional jazz. Considered by many to be one of the greatest artists of our time, Payton believes that the term "jazz" is old-fashioned and prefers to call it "Black American Music" (BAM). BAM combines spirituals, gospel, blues, jazz, and soul.

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the Swing Dealers, an ensemble that finds its roots in the swing jazz of the mid-20th century, but at the same time, it is strongly influenced by a more soulful and contemporary sound. The band evolves around saxophonist Vincent Mardens and vocalist/bassist Jean van Lint. The interaction between saxophone and vocals creates a unique and characteristic sound.

programme.title: Malta Jazz Festival
programme.desc: On July 20, 2018, double bassist Christian McBride presented his band "New Jawn" at the Malta Jazz Festival. A five-time Grammy winner, McBride is one of the most requested, most recorded, and most respected figures in the music world today. Hailing from Philadelphia, this music luminary combines jazz, RandB, pop/rock, hip hop/neo-soul, and classical. Gracing the Malta Jazz stage with him are Nasheet Waits (drums), Marcus Strickland (tenor sax), and Josh Evans (trumpet).

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the bands taking part in this series is Bloco do Ó, a traditional street band associated with the Brazilian carnival. A "bloco" is a group of people who drive through the streets in trucks, playing music and providing fun to anyone who will listen. Immerse yourself in Bloco de Ós world of cheerful melodies and spectacular costumes!

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Parast paikeseloojangut teeb otseulekande villast, et naha sarja finaali, mis on tais mahlakaid eksklusiivseid palasid ja kuulujutte. Kui uhe paari 2021. aasta võitjaks kroonimiseni on jaanud vaid uks oo, liitub Laura Whitmoreiga kuulsuste superfannide paneel, et arutada finalistide viimaseid paevi Armastuse saarel. Lisaks on otse-eetris viimased paarid, kes heidavad valgust oma elule villas!

programme.title: Esmakohtingud
programme.desc: Humoorikas romantika-tõsielusari paaride esmakohtingutest õdusas restoranis. Ärevus, põnevus ja lootus igavesele armastusele kaivad siin kasikaes, sest pimekohtingule saabuv naine ega mees ei tea, kes teda seal ees ootab. Suhteid aitab sattida restorani varvikas personal ettekandjatest kuni baarmenini valja.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud
programme.desc: Humoorikas romantika-tõsielusari paaride esmakohtingutest õdusas restoranis. Ärevus, põnevus ja lootus igavesele armastusele kaivad siin kasikaes, sest pimekohtingule saabuv naine ega mees ei tea, kes teda seal ees ootab. Suhteid aitab sattida restorani varvikas personal ettekandjatest kuni baarmenini valja.

programme.desc: Humoorikas romantika-tõsielusari paaride esmakohtingutest õdusas restoranis. programme.title: Vallaline kaunitar
programme.desc: Michellei sudame eest on jaanud võitlema 23 noormeest. Nende vaimne tugevus pannakse tõsiselt proovile grupikohtingul. Teisel grupikohtingul liitub ullatuskulalisena korvpallitaht, kes õpetab neile meeskonnatoo olulisust.

programme.title: Suvi veiniistanduses
programme.desc: Frankie ja Nate on koos ja valmistuvad linna suviseks suursundmuseks. Nad ei jõua ara oodata, et tutvustada oma uut veini, kuid ootamatu õnnetus paneb proovile nii nende ari kui suhte.

programme.title: Sina, mina ja puhkus magedes
programme.desc: Kui disainer Rebecca vaidab toointervjuul, et on enesekindel liider, pannakse ta vale proovile Tahoe magedes toimuval puhkusel. Ta saab paariliseks Nathani, kes vihkab looduses olemist.

programme.title: Eksid rannal - kehad vormi
programme.desc: Becci ei taha enam olla "see paks õde" ja Kieran ei taha olla "see perekonna kõige nirum". Kas nad jõuavad oma kehad enne "Eksid rannal"-stiilis paljastust umber modelleeerida?

programme.title: Minu kook on parim
programme.desc: Kaes on "mustade hobuste" Marki ja Andrea kord tutvustada oma 3-kaigulist menuud. Kas nad suudavad vastata ootustele või on surve neile liiga suur?

programme.title: Kas abiellume?
programme.desc: Michelle ja Allen on suhtes. Nad kutsuvad viimaks vanemad kulla, et neile abiellumise plaanist raakida. Selgub aga, et nende vanemad juba tunnevad uksteist ja neil on abielust vaga erinevad arvamused.

programme.title: Suur komoodiaõhtu
programme.desc: Suur naljasaade, kus lavale astuvad Juss Haasma, Mirtel Pohla, Argo Aadli, Merle Palmiste, Mart Muurisepp, Kaisa Selde, Tõnis Niinemets ja Tiit Sukk! Nad naerutavad meid lõbusate sketshide, vaimukate paroodiate, ootamatute ulesannete, pooraste liba-uudiste, muusikaliste vigurite ja palju-palju muu toredaga. Lisaks toimub eluliste naljatuupide konkurss, kus iga naitleja saab oma koomiku-talendi eriti uljalt proovile panna. Lusti lisavad hoogne stuudioband, elav publik ja agedad ullatuskulalised.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Soome versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Soome versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Soome versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Parast paikeseloojangut teeb otseulekande villast, et naha sarja finaali, mis on tais mahlakaid eksklusiivseid palasid ja kuulujutte. Kui uhe paari 2021. aasta võitjaks kroonimiseni on jaanud vaid uks oo, liitub Laura Whitmoreiga kuulsuste superfannide paneel, et arutada finalistide viimaseid paevi Armastuse saarel. Lisaks on otse-eetris viimased paarid, kes heidavad valgust oma elule villas!

programme.title: Damaskus
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm raagib raske haigusega võitlevast sepast, kes võtab ette oma elu viimase suure tellimuse - damaskuse terasest mõõga valmistamise. Peategelane on sepp Taimo Kõrvemaa, keda huutakse Sepa Tomiks, aga ka Damaskuseks, sest ta on uks vaheseid meistreid Eestis, kes valdab tehnikat, kuidas damaskuse terasest mõõka valmistada. Filmi teljeks ongi maausuliste poolt mõõga valmistamine, algusest lõpuni. Lisaks lugu sellest, kuidas lastekodu vargapoisist ja rusikakangelasest kasvab valja meister.

programme.title: Sugis veiniistanduses
programme.desc: Frankie ja Nate on mõlemad veendunud, et Sorrento veinitalu kuulub just neile. Nad on sunnitud talu tapselt poolitama ja tagama mõlema poole viinamarjade valmimise, et võistelda parima veini konkursil uksteise vastu. Kas kogu sellest tulist võib ka midagi head sundida?

programme.title: Eksid rannal - kehad vormi
programme.desc: Becci ei taha enam olla "see paks õde" ja Kieran ei taha olla "see perekonna kõige nirum". Kas nad jõuavad oma kehad enne "Eksid rannal"-stiilis paljastust umber modelleeerida?

programme.title: Ja nii ongi?
programme.desc: Populaarteadusliku telesaate 4. osas lendavad teemad taevastesse kõrgustesse. Eesti Lennuakadeemia eksperdid selgitavad, milliste fuusikaseaduste abil lennukid õhus pusivad ja kuidas droonid meie igapaevaellu on tunginud. Kosmoseettevõtte CrystalSpace tutvustab kosmosekaamerat, mis peagi Kuule jõuab ning kosmoseettevõte KappaZeta selgitab, kuidas satelliidilt naiteks metsa kõrgust saaks mõõta.

programme.title: Hooaeg
programme.desc: Saade annab vastused mitmetele kusimustele: Millised on uued kaubamargid Eesti turul naha- ja kehahoolduses, dekoratiivkosmeetikas ning juuksemaailmas? Milliseid tooteid kasutada kodus ning miks tasub minna ennast turgutama ilusalongi? Millised on uued rõiva- ja jalatsikollektsioonid kiirelt arenevas moemaailmas? Millist rõivastust endale valida? Millised on ehtemaailma uudised? Elustiili osas avardavad silmaringi lastega seotud teemad, lemmikloomad, autod, toitlustuskohad, erinevad puhkuse veetmise võimalused nagu spaad ja treeningklubid, muuseumid ja uued raamatud.

programme.title: Rita kook
programme.desc: Ritale tuleb kulla personaalkokk ja toitumisnõustaja Riinu Ratsep, kellega koos uuritakse, kuidas suua suhkruid sedasi, et need tervisele kahju asemel kasu tooksid. Lisaks põnevatele banaanipannkookidele tehakse uheskoos valmis suvehõnguliselt varske Pavlova tort, kiudainerikkad mandlikupsised ning energiakullaseks vahepalaks mõeldud seemnekupsised, kõrvale varskendav rohelise õuna mocktail.

programme.title: Nadiya lihtsad kupsetised
programme.desc: Nadya jagab oma versiooni quicheist, valmistab snickerdoodlei, serveerib marmoriseeritud maasika- ja šokolaadijaatisetorti ning valmistab vurtsikat tursa- ja kookosnuudlileeme.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud
programme.desc: Humoorikas romantika-tõsielusari paaride esmakohtingutest õdusas restoranis. Suhteid aitab sattida restorani varvikas personal ettekandjatest kuni baarmenini valja.

programme.title: Vallaline kaunitar
programme.desc: Michellei usaldus noormeeste vastu on kõikuma loonud. Top Guni filmist inspireeritud valjakutse sunnib neid end uletama ja uks naost-nakku kohting osutub vagagi paljastavaks. Roositseremooniale eelnevad vaga tulised kokkupõrked.

programme.title: Sugis linnas
programme.desc: Piper kolib New Yorki, et alustada uut elu, ja kohtub tudinud kirjaniku Austiniga. Koos kogevad nad sugist New Yorgis ja puuavad aru saada, kes nad tegelikult olla võiks.

programme.title: Kas abiellume?
programme.desc: Michelle ja Allen on suhtes. Nad kutsuvad viimaks vanemad kulla, et neile abiellumise plaanist raakida. Selgub aga, et nende vanemad juba tunnevad uksteist ja neil on abielust vaga erinevad arvamused.

programme.title: Eksid rannal - kehad vormi
programme.desc: Ülikooliaegsed sõbrad Shelbie ja Liv on kilosid kogunud. Vanessa unistab naismaadleja kehast. Kas nad suudavad oma kehad õigeaegselt vormi saada, et "Eksid rannal" paljastuses pahviks luua?

programme.title: Minu kook on parim
programme.desc: Tana õhtul võõrustavad Hamiltoni õed Emma ja Abbie viimast kodurestorani. Kas viimasena kokkamise surve saab nende hukatuseks? Tana õhtul saadetakse uks paar koju.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Postikontoridetektiivid avastavad vaasi, mille sees on kiri, ning peavad leidma vaasi omaniku. Vaasi paritolu on kahtlane, mistõttu seisavad nad silmitsi otsusega - kas teha seda, mis on õige, või seda, mis on seaduslik.

programme.title: Versailles
programme.desc: Louis palub Philippel luurata spiooni jarel ning see muudab taas Chevalier armukadedaks. Fabien saab teada, mida isa Etienne teeb paastetud lastega. Montespan puuab meeleheitlikult kuningat endale tagasi võita, kuid Louis leiab endale uue silmarõõmu.

programme.title: Versailles
programme.desc: Parast protestantide purustamist ja Leto peatamist tunneb Louis end võitmatuna, kuid tema pere ja Prantsusmaa on lahku loodud nign Fabien on vabaduses. Samal ajal plaanivad Jeanne ja massajad Louisle atentaati.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Soome versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Soome versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Armastusesaar hõlmab gruppi võitslejaid, keda nimetatakse saarlasteks. Nad elavad valismaailmast eraldatuna Mallorca villas ja on pideva videovalve all. Villas ellujaamiseks peavad saarlased olema paaris mõne teise saarlasega ning sooritama erinevaid valjakutseid. Võitnud paar saab endale 56 000 eurot.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Postikontoridetektiivid avastavad vaasi, mille sees on kiri, ning peavad leidma vaasi omaniku. Vaasi paritolu on kahtlane, mistõttu seisavad nad silmitsi otsusega - kas teha seda, mis on õige, või seda, mis on seaduslik.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Kihlatud paar tahab oma uhist elu alustada pulmade ja suure remondiga oma Los Angelese kodus.

programme.title: SEAL Team
programme.desc: Jasonit kulastab endine meeskonnakaaslane ja see paneb ta oma rolli meeskonnajuhina umber hindama. Ajal, mil mitmed Bravo liikmed oma isiklike suhete probleemidega maadlevad, saadab juhtkond nad ootamatule missioonile Aafrika rannikule.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Gomorra
programme.desc: Sõda on alanud: samas kui Ciro otsib uusi liitlasi, paigutab Genny tanavatele relvakandjaid ja sokutab Ciro ridadesse oma mehe.

programme.title: Ananassiekspress
programme.desc: Mollukomoodia paevavargast, kes satub mõrva pealtnagijaks ja leiab end kahtlusaluste nimekirjast. Dale laheb narkodiiler Sauli poole, et soetada uut kanepisorti, mida huutakse "Ananassiekspressiks". Paraku jatab Dale mõrvapaigale, kuhu ta kogemata sattus, oma kanepiplaru koni ja politsei alustab talle kui peamisele kahtlusalusele poorast jahti.

programme.title: Surmarelv
programme.desc: Legendaarsetel "Surmarelva" filmidel põhinev action-komoodiasari toob taas kokku kinoajaloo vingeima detektiivide paari! Oma naist leinav endine eriuksuslane Martin Riggs (Clayne Crawford) ja parast infarkti toole naasev Roger Murtaugh (Damon Wayans) moodustavad udini vastandliku, aga ometi ideaalselt toimiva tandemi. Nende koostoo algus on okkaline, sest ohjeldamatu Riggsi pea-ees-tulle-soostmise suhtumine põrkub vaoshoitud Murtaugh arusaamadega. Esimese uhise juhtumi lõppedes mõistavad aga mõlemad, et on lisaks uuele paarimehele leidnud endale ka parima sõbra.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walkeril tuleb peatada politseinike ruhm, mis tegeleb kurjategijate hukkamisega.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker aitab paasta indiaani kogukonda surmava viiruse kuusist.

programme.title: Ohtlikuimad hetked
programme.desc: Uurime, miks on uhe mehe too motoroovlite magnetiks; oleme tunnistajaks mootorrattaga pendelrandajale, kes hoiab kinni oma kallist elust; saame teada, kuidas lapse manguasi võib kooli sõidul eluohtlikuks muutuda; naeme, kuidas uks Suure Õuna pendelrandajatest hammustab rohkem, kui suudab narida; oleme tunnistajaks loomingulisele pendelrandajale, kes teeb aarmuslikke jõupingutusi, et kontorijooks võita ning kui teil on toole sõites kitsas, tutvuge Jaapaniga!

programme.title: Ohtlikuimad hetked
programme.desc: Uurime, kuidas surfar ellu jaab, kui talle langeb peale hiiglaslik laine; oleme tunnistajaks, kuidas sustasõitja jaab kinni kalju ja masleva jõe vahele; saame teada, kuidas algajal deltaplaaneril õnnestub paasta oma kallis elu; naeme, kuidas mootorsaaniga seiklus magedes muutub õudusunenaoks kuristikus ning kuidas parast elu muutvat runnakut teeb trotslik bodysurfar kõik, et uuesti lainetel liuelda.

programme.title: Robsoni ekstreemkalapuugi valjakutse
programme.desc: Seekordne seiklus viib Robsoni New Yorki, kus tema vastaseks on sigarilembene kalanduse Tony Soprano. Kes suudab Vabadussamba juurest esimesena tuuni tabada?

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kuldvillak
programme.desc: "Kuldvillak" on kaasakiskuv telemang. Igas saates asuvad võistlustulle kolm inimest. Nad peavad valima endale sobiva teema. Kui saatejuht Eeva Esse on kusimuse esitanud, loeb võrdselt nii mangija reaktsioonikiirus kui ka teadmiste hulk. Kes kõige kiiremini reageerib, saab õiguse vastata. Õige vastus toob mangija arvele kusimuse vaartuses raha, kui aga vastaja eksib, tuleb suu rahast puhtaks puhkida! Vale vastuse korral utleb saatejuht õige vastuse ja see aitab kodusel televaatajal ka oma teadmisi proovile panna, kaasa mangida ja seelabi end harida. Kui mangijal õnnestub aga võita viis saadet jarjest, on ta tunnistatud Kuldvillaku tšempioniks ja ta annab võimaluse jargmistele...

programme.title: Kaks kanget Venemaal
programme.desc: Kaks kanget, Kristjan Jõekalda ja Teet Margna, seiklevad taas! Seekord võtavad nad ette poorase rongiretke labi lõputu ja alati ootamatu Venemaa. Tallinnast algav seiklus viib semud labi Siberi otse Jaapani mere rannikule Vladivostokki.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Jeremy, Richard ja James on jõudnud oma ringreisil Walesi ning katsetavad seal nn. Euroopa pikape. Kuidas saab Mercedes-Benz X-Class hakkama elektrigeneraatori kaitamisega, VW Amarok kastmismasinana ja Ford Ranger traktorina?

programme.title: Puhademõrvad
programme.desc: Kui jõululaupaeva varajastel hommikutundidel leitakse kaubanduskeskuse parklas hukkamisstiilis maha lastud noormees ja naine, arvavad uurijad, et nende jõhkrate mõrvade põhjuseks võis olla armukolmnurk.

programme.title: Puhademõrvad
programme.desc: Kui noor naine jaab parast 4. juuli rannapidu kadunuks, on uurijatel vahe juhtlõngu, kuni uks keerdkaik paljastab, et naine võib olla piirkonda terroriseeriva kiskja viimane ohver.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Oklahoma vaikelinn on vapustatud, kui populaarne teismeline leitakse metsast surnuna. Kui kahtlusaluseid on mitu, peab politsei suutma eristada fakti fiktsioonist, et mõrvar tabada.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: On tavaline õhtu Whitehousei kulakeses Ohios, kui uks suudlus kaivitab surmaga lõppeva sundmusteahela. Uurijad uurivad baarikulastajaid, kuid kahtlusaluste nimekiri muutub iga tunniga aina pikemaks.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Kui 12-aastane tudruk Tia Sharp jaab Londonis kadunuks, viiakse labi ulatuslik labiotsimine. Jaljed viivad politsei tudruku kodu lahedale.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Naeme, kuidas aastaid parast kuritegu aitab kohtuekspertiis lahendada Becky Godden-Edwardi mõrva ning tuvastab mõrvari, kes kahjuks oli vahepealsete aastate jooksul veel mõrvu sooritanud.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Naine hukkub pealtnaha juhuslikus majapõlengus, kuid uks politseinik leiab marke, mis annavad põhjust oletada, et tegu on millegi pahelisemaga.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Clarkson testib Rootsi suusamagedel ja jaal uut Lamborghini linnamaasturit Urust. May katsetab Prantsuse sportautot Alpine A110, et saada teada, kas see on parem kui prantslaste teised hadised katsetused. Hammond meenutab parimat võidusõitjat labi aegade, Ayrton Senna noorpõlveiidolit Jim Clarki.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Auhinnatud Saksa sari viiest sõbrast Teise maailmasõja paevil. Nii nagu terve Euroopa saatus pannakse ka sarja kangelaste sõprus tõsistel proovile. Allasurutud armastus, viha, põlgus, pettumused, lapsik usk ja lootus maaravad sõprade sõja jalgu jaanud igapaevaelu ja eluteed. Esimeses osas saavad 1941. aasta suvel Berliinis kokku viis sõpra, et uksteisega alanud sõja tõttu huvasti jatta. Elul on iga sõbra jaoks omad plaanid. Saksa sõjavagi liigub võimsalt Moskva poole, ambitsioonikad Wilhelm ja Friedhelm kogevad omal nahal Nõukogude armee vihast vastuhakku. Charlotte narvid ei pea sõjale vastu, Greta satub suurtesse pahandustesse ja tema juudist elukaaslane Viktor uritab Saksamaalt pageda.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Sugis on lõppemas ja Saksa armee varustus ei vasta Venemaa kulma talve tingimustele. Friedhelm pekstakse poolsurnuks ja viiakse haiglasse, kus ta kohtub Charlottega. Viktor saab teada, et Greta petab teda. Wilhelmi pataljon saab jarjekordse tagasiloogi ja karm Vene talv kustutab kaasvõitlejate elukuunlaid. Sõda ja surm panevad Friedhelmi inimelu ule jarele mõtlema.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Saksa vaesalk valmistub viimaseks runnakuks, kuid saatusel on Friedhelmile ja Wilhelmile teised plaanid. Greta saadetakse Laane frondile sõduritele moraalseks toeks, kus ta peab neile enne Kurski lahingut esinema. Viktor põgeneb koos neiu Alinaga rongilt, mis viib juudid natsislikku kontsentratsiooni/havituslaagrisse Saksamaa poolt okupeeritud Poola territooriumil. Wilhelmi ruhm saab kasu telegraafijaama kaaperdamiseks. Runnak ei moodu plaaniparaselt ning Wilhelm kaotab mitu kamraadi.

programme.title: Terrorilinnud
programme.desc: Maddy Stern laheb koos kaaslastega otsima oma isa, kes rutiinse linnuvaatluse ajal kaduma laheb. Metsikus looduses kohtuvad nad aga tiibadega elukatega, kelle sarnast ei ole maailm nainud miljoneid aastaid.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

Allasurutud armastus, viha, põlgus, pettumused, lapsik usk ja lootus maaravad sõprade sõja jalgu jaanud igapaevaelu ja eluteed. Esimeses osas saavad 1941. aasta suvel Berliinis kokku viis sõpra, et uksteisega alanud sõja tõttu huvasti jatta. Elul on iga sõbra jaoks omad plaanid. Saksa sõjavagi liigub võimsalt Moskva poole, ambitsioonikad Wilhelm ja Friedhelm kogevad omal nahal Nõukogude armee vihast vastuhakku. Charlotte narvid ei pea sõjale vastu, Greta satub suurtesse pahandustesse ja tema juudist elukaaslane Viktor uritab Saksamaalt pageda.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Sugis on lõppemas ja Saksa armee varustus ei vasta Venemaa kulma talve tingimustele. Friedhelm pekstakse poolsurnuks ja viiakse haiglasse, kus ta kohtub Charlottega. Viktor saab teada, et Greta petab teda. Wilhelmi pataljon saab jarjekordse tagasiloogi ja karm Vene talv kustutab kaasvõitlejate elukuunlaid. Sõda ja surm panevad Friedhelmi inimelu ule jarele mõtlema.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Saksa vaesalk valmistub viimaseks runnakuks, kuid saatusel on Friedhelmile ja Wilhelmile teised plaanid. Greta saadetakse Laane frondile sõduritele moraalseks toeks, kus ta peab neile enne Kurski lahingut esinema. Viktor põgeneb koos neiu Alinaga rongilt, mis viib juudid natsislikku kontsentratsiooni/havituslaagrisse Saksamaa poolt okupeeritud Poola territooriumil. Wilhelmi ruhm saab kasu telegraafijaama kaaperdamiseks. Runnak ei moodu plaaniparaselt ning Wilhelm kaotab mitu kamraadi.

programme.title: Terrorilinnud
programme.desc: Maddy Stern laheb koos kaaslastega otsima oma isa, kes rutiinse linnuvaatluse ajal kaduma laheb. Metsikus looduses kohtuvad nad aga tiibadega elukatega, kelle sarnast ei ole maailm nainud miljoneid aastaid.

programme.title: Kriminaalselt naljakas
programme.desc: Ebaõnnestunud sissemurdmised, veidrad poevargused ja mannetud tagaajamised politsei poolt ... kuritegelik kaitumine pole kunagi olnud nii lõbus.

programme.title: Kriminaalselt naljakas
programme.desc: Ebaõnnestunud sissemurdmised, veidrad poevargused ja mannetud tagaajamised politsei poolt ... kuritegelik kaitumine pole kunagi olnud nii lõbus.

programme.title: Robsoni ekstreemkalapuugi valjakutse
programme.desc: Robson on Peruu kõige-kõigemaid avastamas, ta kalastab nii pikimas jões, suurimas ookeanis kui kõrgeimate tippude lahedal. Tema esimene valjakutse on forellipuuk 4000 meetri kõrgusel Andides.

programme.title: Rooli võim
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim liiklussaade, mille teemade ring ulatub automarkidest kindlustuseni. Saade paneb proovile ka tuntud inimeste sõiduoskused ning nad paljastavad, mis neid siinses liikluses hairib ning mida tuleks liikluses umber korraldada. Muu hulgas osalevad saate tegijad ka liiklusreididel. Rooli Võim ei ole mõeldud uksnes tanastele autoomanikele ja juhtidele, vaid kõigile, kel tuleb rohkemal või vahemal maaral liiklusega kokku puutuda, ehk siis ka jalakaijatele ja uhistranspordiga liiklejatele.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim politseisaade toob vaatajateni olulisemad krimiuudised. Uudiseid elu pahupoolelt vahendab saatejuht Taavi Otsus.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Saateapsud
programme.desc: Labi aegade on rahvale pakkunud lusti vaadata teletegijate apse - nemad ka ju ikkagi inimesed! Lõbusas erisaates naeme, mis toimub tegelikult menusaadete kaadri taga ja kuidas armastatud eetrinaod ootamatute olukordadega toime tulevad! Saates naeb milliste ootamatustega on rinda pistnud "Õhtu" saatejuhtid Piret, Juri ja Robert, mis ajab pisarateni naerma "Papside" sarja naitlejaid või mida ehmatavat on juhtunud "15 kusimuse" salvestuse ajal.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Venemaal
programme.desc: Kaks kanget, Kristjan Jõekalda ja Teet Margna, seiklevad taas! Seekord võtavad nad ette poorase rongiretke labi lõputu ja alati ootamatu Venemaa. Tallinnast algav seiklus viib semud labi Siberi otse Jaapani mere rannikule Vladivostokki. Tanases saates avastavad reisisellid Moskva uuratuid avarusi ja uritavad osa saada kuulsast 9. mai paraadist.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Clarkson testib Rootsi suusamagedel ja jaal uut Lamborghini linnamaasturit Urust. May katsetab Prantsuse sportautot Alpine A110, et saada teada, kas see on parem kui prantslaste teised hadised katsetused. Hammond meenutab parimat võidusõitjat labi aegade, Ayrton Senna noorpõlveiidolit Jim Clarki.

programme.title: Puhademõrvad
programme.desc: Verd tais mahajaetud auto juhib uurijad kadunud naise ja tema teismelise tutre jalgedele, kes ei jõudnud kunagi perekonna 4. juuli peole. Kui nende sailmed tiigist leitakse, on kõik nende vaikelinnas kahtluse all.

programme.title: Puhademõrvad
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui hundimaski kandev mees naise ja tema veel sundimata lapse halloweeni ajal surnuks pussitab, peavad uurijad kogukonda rahustama ja mõrvari leidma, enne kui ta uuesti rundab.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Louisiana Bayous lõpeb jõulupidu mõrvaga, kui kohalikus baaris leitakse armastatud poeg vereloigust.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Jalgpalliõhtu pidustused lõpevad uhe Orlando City noore fanni jaoks tragoodiaga, kui ta leitakse jargmisel paeval kodus surnuna. Politsei seisab silmitsi hulga kahtlusalustega, kuid vastuseid on vahe.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Uhke pulmapidu magimajas lõpeb tragoodiaga, kui kaks inimest lastakse nende toas maha. Mustiline võõras, kes naib olevat õhku haihtunud, võib olla juhtumi lahendamise võti.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Kui uks ema mõrvatakse oma kodus 1994. aastal, kasutab politsei kriminalistide abi ja kohtuekspertiisivõtteid selle jalgi mõrvari tuvastamiseks.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: 1994. aastal mõrvati Burys asuva bussijaama tualettruumis uks vanaema. Vaadake, kuidas politseiuurijad mõrva toimepanijani jõudsid.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Saatejuhtide kolmik jõuab oma ringreisil Hiina megalinna Chongqingi. Jeremy võtab ette Hongqi L5-e ja tiim puuab apraduste saatel tõestada, et kasutatud laane luksusautod on sellest selgelt paremad. Hammond testib Eboladrooil hiinlaste elektriautot NIO EP9.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Verise võitluse kaigus tundub Friedhelmile, et ta naeb oma venda suremas. Ta maskeerib end nõukogude sõduriks ja jaab ainsana ellu. Charlotte põetab Friendhelmit, kes teatab naisele kurva uudise Wilhelmi surmast. Greta glamuurne elu on kokku varisemas ja tema armuke Dorn poorab talle selja. Wilhelm elab ule granaadiplahvatuse ja leiab rahu uksikus metsaonnis. Tema idull ei kesta kaua, sest peagi mõistetakse ta surma.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Wilhelmi surmanuhtlus tuhistatakse, kuna Saksa armeele on nuud iga mees hinnas. Üritades võita Poola vastupanuliikumise juhi usaldust, riskib Viktor oma eluga. Friedhelmi kannatus pannakse proovile, kui ta vastupanuliikumise liikmete elu peab lõpetama. Charlotte kohtub taas Wilhelmiga, kuid nende armastus on purunenud. Greta saadetakse naistevanglasse, kus ta mõistab, et ta elu võib peagi lõppeda.

programme.title: Meie emad ja isad
programme.desc: Viktor ja ruhm partisane kaaperdavad Saksa sõjavaeesheloni saamaks relvi. Selle kaigus kohtub Viktor taas Friedhelmiga, kes riskib sõbra nimel oma eluga. Nõukogude vaed edenevad aina võidukamalt ja Charlotte langeb võitjate saagiks. Greta ootab uhkusega oma hukkamist ja ei kahetse uhtegi oma elus tehtud otsust. Friedhelm sureb, avades teiste sõdurite silmad ja muutmas nende suhtumist sõtta. Ellujaanud sõbrad kohtuvad taas Berliinis ja tõstavad klaasid elu kaotanud kamraadide malestuseks.

programme.title: Ellujaaja
programme.desc: USA/ Suurbritannia 2015 marul Lavastaja:James McTeigue Osades:Milla Jovovich, Pierce Brosnan, Dylan McDermott Äsja Londonis asuvasse Ameerika Ühendriikide saatkonda lahetatud valisagendi (Milla Jovovich) ulesandeks on takistada terroristidel siseneda USA-ss. See viib naise otse tulejoonele, temast saab sihtmark ja ta lavastatakse suudi. Üritades oma nime puhtaks pesta, peab põgenev agent ara hoidma ka vana-aastaõhtuks Times Squareile kavandatud laiaulatusliku terrorirunnaku.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.
