programme.desc: Sari raagib uhe tavalise pere seiklustest. Perre kuuluvad uks poiss, uks tudruk, uks koer, uks kass, uks hiir ja uks juustutukk, kes elavad koos uhe katuse all. Midagi ei saa ju valesti minna. Või kas saab?

programme.title: Poiss, tudruk, koer, kass, hiir ja juust
programme.desc: Sari raagib uhe tavalise pere seiklustest. Perre kuuluvad uks poiss, uks tudruk, uks koer, uks kass, uks hiir ja uks juustutukk, kes elavad koos uhe katuse all. Midagi ei saa ju valesti minna. Või kas saab?

programme.title: Sõsarad
programme.desc: Need kaks õde on parimad sõbrad ja samal ajal ka surmavaenlased ehk nad on taiesti tavalised õed. Kui nad midagi tahavad, siis mõtlevad nad selle saamiseks valja eriskummalisi plaane, mille taideviimisel purunevad asjad ja saavad viga inimesed.

programme.title: Hoodie
programme.desc: "Hoodie" on superkangelase lugu taiesti tavalisest poisist, kellel on erakordne parkuuri talent ja õiglustunne. Nuud on ta juba kaks aastat harjutanud parkuurimist Soufianiga, Brusseli parima jaljekutiga. Ta teeb seda salaja, sest tema ema, innukas politseinik, ei kiidaks seda iial heaks. Kui kolm naabruskonna last Flo, Basim ja Kenza avastavad Pieteri talendi ja motivatsiooni, uhinevad nad ootamatuks superkangelaste tiimiks nimega tiim Hoodie. Neid uhendab uks eesmark - vabastada naabruskond ulekohtust.

programme.title: Laagrisse veetud
programme.desc: Noored Rossid naasevad Kikiwaka laagrisse ja avastavad, et kampingumajakesi pole taastatud ja Gladys on kadunud. Nuud tuleb neil valja mõelda, kuidas laste tuju uleval hoida. Lisandunud on uued laagrilised Matteo, Destiny ja Finn.

programme.title: Salaagent KC
programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane K. C. Cooper on valitsuse uusim salaagent! Ühine temaga, kui ta õpib, et spioonide peres kasvamine tahendab kõigi missioonide jagamist.

programme.title: LEGO DreamZzz
programme.desc: Mateo on taiesti tavaline poiss, kes uhel ool mõistab, et peab hakkama kaitsma unenagusid Õudusunenao kuninga ja tema jõledate mahhinatsioonide eest. Kuid kas tema unenaod on ikka ainult unenaod? Sest hommikul on akitselt olendid Mateo unenaost tegelikkuseks saanud ja palju muudki on muutunud.

programme.title: Hirmus Henry
programme.desc: Henry on uks hirmus poiss, arvavad taiskasvanud. Aga Henry ise ei tee sellest valja. Isegi kui Henry puuab olla oma venna Perfektse Peteri moodi või kaia balletitunnis, on tulemus ikka võrdlemisi hirmus.

programme.title: Ghostwriter
programme.desc: Kui uks kummitus hakkab raamatupoes end ilmutama ja raamatutegelasi meie maailma laskma, peavad neli last jõud uhendama, et lahendada kummituse lõpetamata asjatoimetustega seotud põnev saladus.

programme.title: Power Rangerid
programme.desc: Eelajaloolisel ajal usaldas tulnukas kumme võimsat vaarisenergi kumne sauruse hoolde. Kui saurused valja surid, laksid kaotsi ka vaarisenergid. Nuud ihkab aga galaktikatevaheline pearahakutt vaarisenergid enda valdusse saada ja Maa havitada.

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik - LEGO sõbrad
programme.sub-title: Kidzone lastehommik - LEGO sõbrad: Uus peatukk
programme.desc: Ela kaasa Heartlakei keskkoolis tegutsevate sõprade taiesti uutele seiklustele!

Kallikarud jatkavad oma missiooni ning jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Maagiline reis Kuule
programme.desc: Saksa populaarsel lasteraamatul põhinev "MAAGILINE REIS KUULE" raagib Peetrist, kes oma vaikse õe kurja Kuumehe kaest paastmiseks asub maagilisele rannakule koos harra Putuka ja Unematiga. Eesti vaatajate jaoks on filmitegelastele oma haale andnud Mikk Jurjens (Peeter), Saara Pius (Anne), Ott Lepland (Kuumees), Erki Aule (Harra Putukas), Merilin Kirbits (Valgunõid), Maarius Parn (Unemati), Karin Aule (Öohaldjas) ja paljud teised.

Kui kolm naabruskonna last Flo, Basim ja Kenza avastavad Pieteri talendi ja motivatsiooni, uhinevad nad ootamatuks superkangelaste tiimiks nimega tiim Hoodie. Neid uhendab uks eesmark - vabastada naabruskond ulekohtust.

programme.title: Salaagent KC
programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane K. C. Cooper on valitsuse uusim salaagent! Ühine temaga, kui ta õpib, et spioonide peres kasvamine tahendab kõigi missioonide jagamist.

programme.title: Laagrisse veetud
programme.desc: Noored Rossid naasevad Kikiwaka laagrisse ja avastavad, et kampingumajakesi pole taastatud ja Gladys on kadunud. Nuud tuleb neil valja mõelda, kuidas laste tuju uleval hoida. Lisandunud on uued laagrilised Matteo, Destiny ja Finn.

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik - LEGO sõbrad
programme.sub-title: Kidzone lastehommik - LEGO sõbrad: Uus peatukk
programme.desc: Ela kaasa Heartlakei keskkoolis tegutsevate sõprade taiesti uutele seiklustele!

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, Gnasher ja nende ulemeelikud sõbrad Rubi, JJ, Pirukanagu ja tema lemmikkartul Paul keedavad kokku pooraseid plaane, satuvad kõikvõimalikesse viperustesse ja võtavad vastu iga valjakutse, olgu see nii suur kui tahes.

programme.title: Power Rangerid
programme.desc: Eelajaloolisel ajal usaldas tulnukas kumme võimsat vaarisenergi kumne sauruse hoolde. Kui saurused valja surid, laksid kaotsi ka vaarisenergid. Nuud ihkab aga galaktikatevaheline pearahakutt vaarisenergid enda valdusse saada ja Maa havitada.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: Noor poiss ihkab saada professionaalseks Beybladei mangijaks. Ta soovib jõuda torni nimega X, kus elukutselised bleiderid kokku saavad.

programme.title: Suvevaheaeg
programme.desc: Kuus teismelist noort veedavad unustamatu suve muinasjutulises kuurordis. Paraku mitte puhkajatena, vaid hotellis tood rabades. Kuigi toopaevad on pikad ja ulemused karmid, aitab surfamine agedatel lainetel unustada kõik mured ning tanu headele sõpradele laheb aeg lennates.

programme.title: Suvevaheaeg
programme.desc: Kuus teismelist noort veedavad unustamatu suve muinasjutulises kuurordis. Paraku mitte puhkajatena, vaid hotellis tood rabades. Kuigi toopaevad on pikad ja ulemused karmid, aitab surfamine agedatel lainetel unustada kõik mured ning tanu headele sõpradele laheb aeg lennates.

programme.title: Kidz Megamix
programme.desc: Kõige agedamad, kõige vaadatumad, kõige uuemad muusikavideod teismelistele fannidele.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Saa osa Barbie "Malibu" Robertsi ja Barbie "Brooklyn" Robertsi põnevatest uutest seiklustest! Barbie ja Barbie kaivad esituskunstide koolis New Yorgis, kavandavad muusikademo salvestamist ja proovivad kummalisi toootsi, et oma unistusi taide viia. Samal ajal tutvuvad nad Suure Õunaga ning kaivad sageli Malibus sõpradel ja perel kulas. Sõpruse, pere, kire ja sihikindluse abil naevad sõbrannad vaeva ja puudlevad oma unistuste poole.

programme.title: Valge delfiin Zoom
programme.desc: Kartmatu 15-aastane poiss Yann ja tema 7-aastane õde Marina elavad koos oma onu Patrickuga troopilisel paradiisisaarel Maotoul. Yanni parim sõber on Zoom, aarmiselt arukas valge delfiin, kellega koos satutakse vapustavatesse seiklustesse.

programme.title: Valge delfiin Zoom
programme.desc: Kartmatu 15-aastane poiss Yann ja tema 7-aastane õde Marina elavad koos oma onu Patrickuga troopilisel paradiisisaarel Maotoul. Yanni parim sõber on Zoom, aarmiselt arukas valge delfiin, kellega koos satutakse vapustavatesse seiklustesse.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, Gnasher ja nende ulemeelikud sõbrad Rubi, JJ, Pirukanagu ja tema lemmikkartul Paul keedavad kokku pooraseid plaane, satuvad kõikvõimalikesse viperustesse ja võtavad vastu iga valjakutse, olgu see nii suur kui tahes.

programme.title: Maagiline reis Kuule
programme.desc: Saksa populaarsel lasteraamatul põhinev "MAAGILINE REIS KUULE" raagib Peetrist, kes oma vaikse õe kurja Kuumehe kaest paastmiseks asub maagilisele rannakule koos harra Putuka ja Unematiga. Eesti vaatajate jaoks on filmitegelastele oma haale andnud Mikk Jurjens (Peeter), Saara Pius (Anne), Ott Lepland (Kuumees), Erki Aule (Harra Putukas), Merilin Kirbits (Valgunõid), Maarius Parn (Unemati), Karin Aule (Öohaldjas) ja paljud teised.

programme.title: Salaagent KC
programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane K. C. Cooper on valitsuse uusim salaagent! Ühine temaga, kui ta õpib, et spioonide peres kasvamine tahendab kõigi missioonide jagamist.

programme.title: LEGO DreamZzz
programme.desc: Mateo on taiesti tavaline poiss, kes uhel ool mõistab, et peab hakkama kaitsma unenagusid Õudusunenao kuninga ja tema jõledate mahhinatsioonide eest. Kuid kas tema unenaod on ikka ainult unenaod? Sest hommikul on akitselt olendid Mateo unenaost tegelikkuseks saanud ja palju muudki on muutunud.

programme.title: Sõsarad
programme.desc: Need kaks õde on parimad sõbrad ja samal ajal ka surmavaenlased ehk nad on taiesti tavalised õed. Kui nad midagi tahavad, siis mõtlevad nad selle saamiseks valja eriskummalisi plaane, mille taideviimisel purunevad asjad ja saavad viga inimesed.

programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Parast perereisi kaunisse makke, kaotab isa autovõtmed sugavale kanalisatsiooni.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Kui lemmiksaurus kaotab oma saba, siis George kulastab hr Rebast, et uut leida.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Pahatahtliku robotarmee kadumisest on moodunud kaks aastat. Kuna Toboteid pole enam vaja lainud, on neist saanud legend. Ryan, Kory ja Dylan on juba viiendas klassis ning Franklin (Ryani ja Kory isa) ja Limo (Dylani isa) juhivad koos autoremonditookoda. Aga kui uus pahalane koos oma robotitega seab linna rahu ohtu, peavad Tobotid uuesti toole asuma.

programme.desc: Vaikesed julged reaktiivlennukid randavad mooda maailma ja aitavad lastel keerulisi probleeme lahendada.

programme.title: Gabby nukumaja
programme.desc: Gabby leiab karbist rasvakriite ja joonistusvihiku, mille igal lehel on uhesugune kritseldus. Ta viib selle nukumajja, kus kõik naevad kritselduses midagi erisugust ja teevad sellest imelise pildi. Aga kui Vembukass jaab vihikusse lõksu, siis peavad Gabby ja Pandi minema teda vihiku sisse paastma.

programme.title: Vikerkaare Ruby
programme.desc: "Vikerkaare Ruby" on lugu tragist ja leidlikust vaikesest tudrukust, kes kaib imevael Vikerkaare kulas, veidral maal, kus elavad tema manguasjad. Seal kehastab Ruby nende aitamiseks erinevate ametite esindajaid.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Toomas ja sõbrad
programme.desc: Vaikese veduri Toomase ja tema sõprade seiklused.

programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Uus seiklus viib nad veidrale maale ning kallikarud peavad tavalisest veelgi enam uksteisele toetuma. Kallikarud jatkavad oma missiooni ning jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Kallikarud jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

programme.title: Badanamu lood
programme.desc: Sarjas kasitsetakse eelkooliealiste laste elu keskseid teemasid nii, et need sisendavad kujutlusvõimet ja imestamist argipaeva. Kogu loo kestel omandavad noored vaatajad olulisi sotsiaalseid, emotsionaalseid ja praktilisi õppetunde.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Pahatahtliku robotarmee kadumisest on moodunud kaks aastat. Kuna Toboteid pole enam vaja lainud, on neist saanud legend. Ryan, Kory ja Dylan on juba viiendas klassis ning Franklin (Ryani ja Kory isa) ja Limo (Dylani isa) juhivad koos autoremonditookoda. programme.desc: Vaikesed julged reaktiivlennukid randavad mooda maailma ja aitavad lastel keerulisi probleeme lahendada.

programme.title: Gabby nukumaja
programme.desc: Gabby ja Pandi muudetakse kogemata pisitillukesteks, kui Kiisunaki võlusegu umber laheb. Nad peavad tavasuurusesse tagasi saamiseks leidma võlusegu õiged koostisosad, mis tahendab nukumajas toimuvat otsinguretke! Paeva kassiks on Kiisunakk, kes naitab meile, kuidas teha satendavat nakilima.

programme.title: Vikerkaare Ruby

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Toomas ja sõbrad
programme.desc: Vaikese veduri Toomase ja tema sõprade seiklused.

programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Uus seiklus viib nad veidrale maale ning kallikarud peavad tavalisest veelgi enam uksteisele toetuma. Kallikarud jatkavad oma missiooni ning jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: На луне
programme.desc: Глеб, сын очень важного, обеспеченного и высокопоставленного господина, заслужил своими сомнительными подвигами на грани криминала репутацию сорвиголовы и беспредельщика. Однажды во время ночных гонок по улицам Москвы, уходя от преследования ГИБДД, Глеб не справился с управлением и сбил пешехода. Пока неприятности не улягутся, отец отсылает сына подальше в северные края, туда, где он любил охотиться еще в 90-е и где познакомился с отшельником, живущим в лесу. Именно у него и "прячут" Глеба. Для молодого человека начинается совершенно иная жизнь с крайне непредсказуемым, мрачным и молчаливым стариком.

programme.title: Из жизни Федора Кузькина
programme.desc: Печальная история Федора Кузькина, разделившего с родной страной все тяготы тридцатых, а затем и сороковых годов. Теперь Кузькин решает стать единоличником. Но вновь начинаются мытарства крестьянина - и уже без надежды...

programme.title: Meie kalmistu kutt
programme.desc: Võla kustutamise nimel on peategelane nõus kasvõi surnuaial tootama, kuid juba esimese oovalve ajal ilmuvad kalmistule salaparased kulalised. Mida teha — põgeneda või selgus majja tuua?

programme.title: Миттельмарш
programme.desc: Бабушка 18-летнего отшельника Мити покупает дружбу карманника Ковальски со своим внуком. Она и предположить не может, что её Митя стоит за необычным культурным движением по спасению памятников, охватившим весь Петербург. Неожиданно для всех в сделку вмешивается девушка Ковальски Полина. Это приключение может разрушить жизнь всех троих, став началом любовного треугольника и культурной революции.

programme.title: Unenagudeski mitte...
programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane Katja Ševtšenko kolib uude rajooni ja tutvub koolis klassikaaslase Roman Lavotškiniga. Aegamisi kasvab nende sõprus taiskasvanute suureks ullatuseks ule armastuseks. Katja ema Ljudmila oli nooruses Romani isa Konstantini armastatu, ent hulgas mehe. Romani ema Vera on armukade, vihkab Ljudmilat ja uhtlasi ka tema tutart. Ta puuab lapsi iga hinna eest lahku viia: paneb Romani teise kooli ja keelab neil kohtuda, aga Katja ja Roma armastus sellega ei lõpe.

programme.title: Концерт отменяется
programme.desc: Незадачливый герой-любовник Коля оказывается заперт в шкафу, а сам шкаф в эпицентре совместной операции МВД и Госнаркоконтроля. Герою предстоит преодолеть немалый путь, выжить в перестрелке, плену и в болоте, найти общий язык со стражами порядка и даже сесть на хвост Дмитрию Хрусталеву, чтобы вновь обрести свободу.

programme.title: Baikonur
programme.desc: R: Veit Helmer. O: Alexander Asochakov, Marie de Villepin, Sitora Farmonova jt. Draama. Vaeslaps Iskander Orinbekov, keda tema suure raketihuvi tõttu kutsutakse Gagariniks, elab vaikeses Kungei kulas Baikonuri kosmodroomi lahedal. Kularahvas on tahes-tahtmata enamvahem kursis kõigega, mis nende pea kohal toimub. Ühel paeval leiab Iskander prantslanna Julie - parast hadamaandumist meelemarkuse kaotanud kosmoseturistist kaunitari. Kirjutamata stepiseaduse jargi kuulub kõik see, mis on taevast kukkunud, leidjale. Iskander on valmis milleks iganes: andma naisele ema kunagise pulmakleidi, paigutama oma jurtasse vanni ja koguni kodukandist lahkuma. Kuid kas Julie, keda Gagarin kutsub kasahhiparaselt Koketaiks, oskab noormehe ohvrimeelsust hinnata? Maagilis-realistlikule draamale kirjutas filmimuusika hinnatud serbia helilooja Goran Bregović.

programme.title: Vene rahvusliku jahi eripara
programme.desc: Noor soome kirjanik Raivo kirjutab raamatut vene rahvusliku jahipidamise eriparast ning saabub Venemaale, et seda eripara kohapeal uurida. Kohaliku sõjavaeosa kindral koos oma semudega võtavad rahvusliku jahitraditsioonide tutvustamise hea meelega enda kanda ja õige varsti sõidetakse jahile, unustamata sealjuures kaasa varuda piisavat kogust viina... ning esimesed rahvusliku jahipidamise "eriparad" ei lase end kaua oodata, pakkudes Raivole raamatu jaoks rohkem materjali, kui ta eales oleks osanud arvatagi.

programme.title: Eli raamat
programme.desc: Seikluspõnevik uksildasest sõdalasest Elist, kes on viimased 30 aastat rannanud mooda sõjast laastatud ja bandiitidest ruustatud maad. Ometi leiab ta lohutust raamatust, milles võib peituda võti kogu inimkonna paastmiseks ja mida ta peab kaitsma oma elu hinnaga.

programme.title: Mina tahan ka
programme.desc: Muusik, bandiit, tema sõber Matvei oma eaka isaga ja noor kaunitar — asuvad otsima õnne‑kellatorni, mis võtab inimesi valikuliselt endaga kaasa. Igauks usub, et just tema osutub valjavalituks.

programme.title: Тибра
programme.desc: 13-летняя девочка-альбинос по прозвищу Мука — единственный свидетель загадочного исчезновения сверстницы — влюбляется в главного подозреваемого, и проходит путь от изгоя до человека, от которого зависят чужие судьбы.

programme.title: Unenagudeski mitte...
programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane Katja Ševtšenko kolib uude rajooni ja tutvub koolis klassikaaslase Roman Lavotškiniga. Aegamisi kasvab nende sõprus taiskasvanute suureks ullatuseks ule armastuseks. programme.title: Долгие проводы
programme.desc: Сын Саша - смысл всей её жизни. Теперь, когда сын подрос, у неё появилось больше свободного времени и она позволяет чуткому Николаю Сергеевичу ухаживать за собой. После летней поездки сына к отцу она замечает в Саше перемены. Тайком прочитав письмо его отца, она узнаёт, что сын хочет уехать. Ей не хватает мудрости, чтобы понять и принять изменения в жизни сына. А Саша оказывается тоньше и сильнее матери...

programme.title: Vene rahvusliku jahi eripara
programme.desc: Noor soome kirjanik Raivo kirjutab raamatut vene rahvusliku jahipidamise eriparast ning saabub Venemaale, et seda eripara kohapeal uurida. Kohaliku sõjavaeosa kindral koos oma semudega võtavad rahvusliku jahitraditsioonide tutvustamise hea meelega enda kanda ja õige varsti sõidetakse jahile, unustamata sealjuures kaasa varuda piisavat kogust viina... ning esimesed rahvusliku jahipidamise "eriparad" ei lase end kaua oodata, pakkudes Raivole raamatu jaoks rohkem materjali, kui ta eales oleks osanud arvatagi.

programme.title: Особенности национальной рыбалки
programme.desc: Компания старых приятелей, достойно выдержавших испытание национальной охотой, вновь собирается вместе - на сей раз для того, чтобы культурно отдохнуть под видом рыбной ловли. В разгар веселья друзья узнают, что, сами того не ведая, пересекли государственную границу и отдыхают уже в Финляндии. После поспешного возвращения выясняется, что по ту сторону Финского залива осталось очень много водки. Так что хочешь не хочешь, а придётся возвращаться.

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: USA / Hong Kong 2016 Komoodia, draama, muusikal Lavastaja:Damien Chazelle Osades:Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Rosemarie DeWitt Los Angelese kiirteel liiklusummikus viibides tekib noorel naitlejannal Mia Dolanil (Emma Stone) liiklusraevust kantud tuli labimurret ihkava džasspianisti Sebastian Wilderiga (Ryan Gosling). Parast kohutavat paeva laheb sellele jargnev prooviesinemine kehvasti, kui castingu-reþissoor keset emotsionaalselt laetud stseeni telefoniga vestleb. Samal õhtul viib Mia toakaaslane ta Hollywood Hillsis toimuvale suurejoonelisele peole, kus Mia loodab labimurret saavutada. Ta jalutab sealt jala koju, kuna ta auto teisaldatakse. Restoranis esinedes hakkab Sebastian kirglikult dþassilikult improviseerima, kuigi restorani omanik Bill (J.K. Simmons) kaskis tal ainult valjavalitud traditsioonilisi jõululaule esitada. Mia kuuleb moodudes seda muusikat. Ta siseneb liigutatult restorani, ent Sebastian vallandatakse allumatuse tõttu. Kui Sebastian restoranist valja tormab, uritab Mia talle komplimenti teha, ent mees tõukab ta eemale. Mõned kuud hiljem kohtub Mia Sebastianiga peol, kus too mangib 1980. aastate kaverlugusid esitavas bandis. Mia narrib meest, paludes tal mangida lugu "I Ran (So Far Away)", mida Sebastian peab tõsiseltvõetava muusiku jaoks solvavaks. Parast esinemist jalutavad nad koos oma autodeni, norides uksteise kallal hoolimata nende vahel toimivast keemiast. Jargmisel paeval tuleb Sebastian Mia too juurde ning too tutvustab talle filmistuudiot, kus ta baristana tootab, kirjeldades samas, kui vaga ta naitlemist armastab. Sebastian viib Mia dþassklubisse ja kirjeldab, kui vaga ta dþassi armastab. Ta unistuseks on ise dþassiklubi avada. Neil tekivad uksteise suhtes soojad tunded. Sebastian kutsub Mia vaatama filmi "Põhjuseta massaja" ning too nõustub, unustades kokkuleppe, mis tal oli praeguse kallimaga. Tudinedes igaval topeltkohtingul, mille ta kallim oli korraldanud, põgeneb Mia kinno, kust leiab vahetult enne seansi algust Sebastiani. Kui filmiprojektor katki laheb, lõpetavad nad oma õhtu kahekesi Griffithi observatooriumi juures romantiliselt tantsides. Parast veel mõningaid luhtunud prooviesinemisi otsustab Mia Sebastiani soovitusel kirjutada naidendi uhele naisnaitlejale. Sebastian hakkab regulaarselt dþassklubis esinema ning nad hakkavad koos elama. Sebastiani endine klassikaaslane Keith (John Legend) kutsub ta mangima klahvpille oma jazz fusion bandis, mis pakuks talle pusivat sissetulekut. Kuigi Sebastianit hairib bandi popstiil, sõlmib ta nendega siiski lepingu, kuna kuuleb, kuidas Mia veenab oma ema, et Sebastian naeb oma karjaari kallal vaeva. Bandi saadab edu, ent kui Mia uhele nende kontserdile laheb, hairib teda arusaam, et Sebastian ei naudi muusikat, mida nad esitavad. Bandi esimese turnee ajal tekib Mial ja Sebastianil tuli. Mia suudistab Sebastianit, et too on oma unistused huljanud, Sebastian aga vaidab, et ta meeldis Miale rohkem, kui ta veel edukas polnud. Mia lahkub solvunult ja kibestunult. Sebastian ei jõua Mia naidendit vaatama, kuna viibib bandi pildistamisel, mille oli unustanud. Naidend on tõeline labikukkumine, publik

programme.title: Испытание
programme.desc: Режиссёр: Александр Котт / Они живут в степи. Отец и дочь. Ничто не может нарушить вечный порядок. Завтра наступает всегда. И каждое утро отец уезжает работать. И она остается одна. Ждать отца. И чувствовать. Двое любят ее. Она любит каждого. Любовь нельзя поделить. Однажды решение приходит само. Оттуда, где солнце.

Ей не хватает мудрости, чтобы понять и принять изменения в жизни сына. А Саша оказывается тоньше и сильнее матери...

programme.title: Loomine 21. sajandil
programme.desc: За время, прошедшее со дня опубликования книги Дарвина "Происхождения видов", теория эволюции глубоко укоренилась в сознании людей. Повествования о сотворении всего Всемогущим Творцом кажется людям совершенно несовместимым с современными научными открытиями. Нам со школьной скамьи навязывают мысль о теории эволюции как "завершенную картину" - случай, время и законы природы позаботились о том, чтобы за миллионы лет постепенно развились сегодняшние формы жизни. В действительности же растущее число естественнонаучных открытий указывает на то, что эволюционная теория была слишком поспешно принята за факт.

programme.desc: Saatesari, mis kajastab kristliku maailma uudiseid ja põnevaid ning julgustavaid lugusid inimeste eludest ule terve maailma.

programme.title: John ja Lisa Bevere. Sõnumitooja
programme.desc: Джон и Лиза Бивер - проповедники и авторы многих христианских бестселлеров являются основателями международного служения Посланник (Messenger International), которое призвано помочь людям, семьям, церквям и народам понимать и испытать преобразующую силу Божьего Слова.

programme.title: Tee Jumala riiki. Jentezen Franklin

programme.title: John ja Lisa Bevere. Sõnumitooja
programme.desc: Джон и Лиза Бивер - проповедники и авторы многих христианских бестселлеров являются основателями международного служения Посланник (Messenger International), которое призвано помочь людям, семьям, церквям и народам понимать и испытать преобразующую силу Божьего Слова.

programme.title: Loomine 21. sajandil
programme.desc: За время, прошедшее со дня опубликования книги Дарвина "Происхождения видов", теория эволюции глубоко укоренилась в сознании людей. Повествования о сотворении всего Всемогущим Творцом кажется людям совершенно несовместимым с современными научными открытиями. Нам со школьной скамьи навязывают мысль о теории эволюции как "завершенную картину" - случай, время и законы природы позаботились о том, чтобы за миллионы лет постепенно развились сегодняшние формы жизни. В действительности же растущее число естественнонаучных открытий указывает на то, что эволюционная теория была слишком поспешно принята за факт.

programme.title: Israeli reisijuht | Teekond labi ajaloo | Drive Through History
programme.desc: Познавательная, экскурсионно-туристическая телепрограмма об истории и достопримечательностях Израиля.

programme.title: Jean-Yves Thibaudet, San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen
programme.sub-title: Jean-Yves Thibaudet, San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen: Scriabin - Prometheus
programme.desc: San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, Esa-Pekka Salonen (conductor) Jean-Yves Thibaudet (piano) Mathilde Laurent (perfumer) Alexander Scriabin 1872 - 1915 Prometheus, The Poem of Fire Alexander Scriabins symphonic poem "Prometheus, The Poem of Fire" celebrates synesthesia and cosmic unity. Devised by San Francisco Symphony Music Director Esa-Pekka Salonen, pianist Jean-Yves Thibaudet, and Cartier in-house perfumer Mathilde Laurent, the San Francisco Symphony and Cartier present a multisensory production of Prometheus. This collaborative world premiere combines dynamic musical and light performance with olfactory curation, subsuming audiences in Scriabins creative vision more than a century after the piece of total art was composed. Directed by Sebastien Glas San Francisco, Davies Symphony Hall, 3 mars 2024

programme.title: Rachmaninov revisited
programme.desc: Rachmaninov revisited Celebrated in his day not only as a great composer, Sergei Rachmaninov was also admired as an outstanding pianist who was a peerless interpreter of his own works including the piano concerti and the Rhapsody on a Theme by Paganini. It is well known that he was in effect the sole pianist capable of performing his most demanding Third Piano Concerto and his performances and recording of the concerto came to be considered as the definitive ones. The relationship between performance, interpretation, and Rachmaninovs own life is addressed in this film by young pianists. They explore the evolution of interpretation over the past few decades with brief excerpts of recordings by Rachmaninov as contrasted with contemporary performances by todays well-known young pianists as they comment on the differences (or similarities) of their approach. Directed by Peter Rosen

programme.title: Simon Rattle and the Berliner Philharmoniker
programme.sub-title: Simon Rattle and the Berliner Philharmoniker: Symphony No.6 by Mahler
programme.desc: On November 14, 1987, a promising conductor made his Berlin Philharmonic debut with Gustav Mahlers Symphony No. 6: Simon Rattle. In retrospect Rattle says, "I felt that I was finding my voice on that day." Mahlers multifaceted work is now again on the program when Sir Simon appears for the last time as chief conductor of the Berliner Philharmoniker in the Philharmonie in 2018. The wheel comes full circle. Mahlers Symphony No. 6 is often referred to by the nickname Tragische ("Tragic"). Mahler composed work during a happy time in his life, as he had married his wife Alma in 1902 and became father of his second daughter. This contrasts with the tragic and even nihilistic last movement of the symphony.

programme.title: Jacqueline du Pre
programme.sub-title: Jacqueline du Pre: A Gift Beyond Words
programme.desc: A tribute to Jacqueline du Pre to mark the thirtieth anniversary of her death, on 19 October 1987. The film contains archive footage shot during Jacqueline du Pres lifetime which captures some glorious and professionally filmed live performances. It also remembers both her personality and her music through the memories and tributes of her closest friends and colleagues including Daniel Barenboim, Pinchas Zukerman, Itzhak Perlman, Toby Perlman, Fou Tsong, Zubin Mehta, William Pleeth, Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau, Hugh Maguire, Elizabeth Wilson, Cynthia Friend, Charles Beare, Suvi Grubb, Dr Len Selby and Clive Barda.

programme.title: The Little cunning vixen by Leoš Janáček at the Opera national de Paris
programme.desc: The Little Cunning Vixen, by Leos Janacek Orchestra, Chorus and Atelier Lyrique of Opera National de Paris, Dennis Russell Davies (direction) Andre Engel (stage director) Elena Tsallagova (the vixen), Jukka Rasilainen (Gamekeeper), Michèle Lagrange (Gamekeepers wife / Owl), Hannah Esther Minutillo (the fox), David Kuebler (Schoolmaster), Roland Bracht (Priest), Paul Gay (Harasta) Directed by Don Kent Recorded at the Opera national de Paris in 2008 The story is actually very simple: a gamekeeper falls in love with a vixen, who symbolises beauty, femininity and wit. She lives among humans and understands that animals are free, rather than slaves to the human race. A fantastic and entertaining bestiary appears on stage. The childrens performance is superb. Who else could convey such freshness, such savagery and such an imaginary world? We are offered a glimpse of an enchanted and fantastical world where love and freedom reign supreme. This light-spirited, naïve and melancholy fable introduces us to the great theatre of life. With ineffable poetry, Janácek listens to and recreates the eternal Song of the Earth. .

programme.title: Stan Getz _ The Last Video Recording
programme.desc: Regarded as the greatest instrumental soloist of all-time, Stanley Gayetzky, famously known as Stan Getz emerged as one of the most significant musical forces in the world of jazz post World War II. With his distinctively warm and lyrical tone, Getz is fondly dubbed as "The Sound" because of his singularity and musical innovations. His commitment to music is evident from his long body of work that includes over 300 pieces of musical compositions. Ranked among Americas top tenor saxophone players, Getz was a gifted saxophonist who could play just about anything on it, a quality that put him on top of the polls. He is accredited for playing some of the best jazz with some of the best jazzmen in the country. However, his personal life was a rollercoaster ride — tumultuous and loused up by abjection, alcohol, addiction and furious flare-ups.

programme.title: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau
programme.desc: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau: Last Words The great German baritone Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau was greatly admired for his interpretive insight, note-perfect control of the tonal qualities, and shadings of color in his voice, for exceptional rhythmic sense and impeccable diction. His reputation as a lieder singer is so high - he had a repertoire of more than 3.000 songs - that it is easy to forget his extensive list of operatic roles. In this conversation Fischer-Dieskau reveals for the last time on camera the secrets of his outstanding career. His "Last Words" provide a deep insight into the extraordinary artistic life of one of the most famous and prolific lieder singers of our time. Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau died in May 2012 at the age of 86. Directed by Bruno Monsaingeon 2013

programme.title: Geordie rannik
programme.desc: The Geordies are back but theres trouble in the Toon. Chloe and Sam have broken up but they still live together and to make things super awkward, theyre coming back into the house together...#Complicated! Annas kept the Newbies on! Nats coming back wanting to make stronger friendships with the other girls, Bethan and Beau are still seeing each other and Tahlias looking forward to chasing boys and, who knows, maybe even girls?! But to spice things up, the Boss is also bringing back Original Geordie James and Party Animal Abbie. James is single and ready to mingle and Abbies got a boyfriend but is ready to fight for her place in the house, which doesnt go down well with Beau and Bethan. Chloe and Sams relationship status changes like the wind but things come to a head when a secret about Chloe in Ibiza is revealed! Nay fear though, Nathan makes sure the family doesnt fall apart and the Squad are as Radge as ever, they party hard in Portugal and even give camping a go - its a pure frisk!

programme.title: Ink Master
programme.desc: Reality competition series. Some of Americas most ambitious tattoo artists compete in a series of challenges showcasing their remarkable skills and artistic styles. The artists will have to "ink on their feet" if they are to prevail, as in each episode a contestant is eliminated from the show, with the last artist standing taking home the whopping $100,000 prize and, of course, the heralded title of Ink Master. The contestants works are judged by both experts in the industry and tattoo enthusiasts. Presented by Dave Navarro, guitarist of rock band Janes Addiction and former guitarist of the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

programme.title: Ink Master

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.sub-title: Ex problems, house problems, mum problems
programme.desc: This reality show follows the journeys of four teenage girls, and their journeys into motherhood. We follow the trials and tribulations they face as they reach a new milestone in their life; entering motherhood. There will be some lows but also the most incredible highs, as with any new parent. They will be learning on the job, and the show follows them every step of the way, looking at how their relationships, education, and financial situations change, too.

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Catfish
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. But after no phone calls and always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on and offer to help him seek out the truth.

programme.title: The Surreal Life
programme.sub-title: Villa of Secrets: A Different Kind of Spiritual Awakening
programme.desc: The Surreal Life fam is sent on a mission of self-love where they participate in a healing Cacao ceremony and movement ritual. Then SLOAN shocks everyone when some familiar guests start arriving at the villa!

programme.title: The Surreal Life
programme.desc: Cameras roll as a group of fading celebrities move into a Hollywood Hills mansion together for two weeks, documenting their interaction with one another, as well as their daily lives and participation efforts in various group activities.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore OGs return for a spin off series that sees them get up to their old antics on holiday. Heading of on vacation together for the month, see if the cast are still up for a Blast in a Glass or if theyve mellowed out now theyre supposed to be real adults. With a wedding on the cards and an ongoing court case, will they even have time to Jersey Turnpike? Reunite with the OGs again and get an update on how life after the Shore is treating them, over ten years since they first burst onto our screens.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: MTV Top 20
programme.desc: Lets take a look at some of the biggest hits that are circulating the globe right now in this top 20 countdown!

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: Behind the Music
programme.desc: The iconic franchise is back and better than ever in a new format bringing both brand-new episodes featuring new artists, as well as a remastered series of updated classic episodes. The award-winning series, which was nominated for three consecutive Primetime Emmys, continues the groundbreaking legacy of intimately connecting fans to the most important musical stories of our time. New episodes feature a select group of artists to share their stories through a cutting-edge interactive experience. Artists have the opportunity to react to key milestone moments from their life and career through an immersive journey of archival footage and photos. Plus, a unique look at some of the biggest artists of all time, looking back at their original episodes, and sharing the up and downs of their journeys since their last episode. With a fresh look and brand-new perspective, each of the artists stories will also include exclusive stories from celebrities that were deeply inspired by the featured artist.

programme.title: Real World/Road Rules Challenge
programme.desc: This thirty-fifth season of the MTV reality competition series The Challenge sees members The Real World, Are You the One?, Big Brother, Celebrity Big Brother UK, The Amazing Race, Survivor, Geordie Shore, Ex on the Beach, Shipwrecked and Survival of the Fittest go head-to-head in a bid to secure the 1 million dollar prize. The competitors participate in daily challenges and can be nominated to take part in the elimination round where they battle against another adversary to avoid being sent home. The remaining combatants endure a harrowing final challenge which pushes them to the limits of their strength and determination.

programme.title: Real World/Road Rules Challenge
programme.sub-title: The End of An Era Part 1
programme.desc: This thirty-fifth season of the MTV reality competition series The Challenge sees members The Real World, Are You the One?, Big Brother, Celebrity Big Brother UK, The Amazing Race, Survivor, Geordie Shore, Ex on the Beach, Shipwrecked and Survival of the Fittest go head-to-head in a bid to secure the 1 million dollar prize. The competitors participate in daily challenges and can be nominated to take part in the elimination round where they battle against another adversary to avoid being sent home. The remaining combatants endure a harrowing final challenge which pushes them to the limits of their strength and determination.

programme.title: The Surreal Life
programme.sub-title: Villa of Secrets: All is Revealed
programme.desc: SLOAN sends the housemates on a mission to celebrate who theyve become during this lifechanging experience at their very own Quinceañera. During their final family dinner, the housemates break bread and boundaries one last time.

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Catfish
programme.desc: Nursing Associate Leanne is desperate to find out if online love Jamie is her Mr Right. But after cancelling on her numerous times, Leanne wants Oobah and Nella to investigate and finally bring them face to face.

programme.title: Real World/Road Rules Challenge
programme.sub-title: The End of An Era Part 2

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Loyalties and friendships are tested when betrayal is on the menu. Private chef, Shay, suspects her longtime boyfriend, Tony, is serving up more than food at his food truck. Tami and her team help Shay get to the bottom of Tonys secret sauce.

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: Seattle-based Kylee is confused about why her girlfriend Tonee could be hiding her. Tonee only lives about forty minutes away, but it feels like they live in two separate worlds. After two years together, Kylee needs answers.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.desc: Tee oma hommikused asjaajamised MyMorning saate taustal, et varskust toovate hittide saatel paevale vastu minna.

programme.title: A Leopards Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambias Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. Shes just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, its a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Savanna Queens. The African Savanna is home to the ultimate animal sisterhood; a family of elephants. A new baby will need the familys support to make it through. While mom learns how to care for her, it is the babys grandmother that must protect her.

programme.title: The Real Black Panther
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Theres a new challenger in the Kabini Forest of India, one unlike all leopards that came before him. This is the story of Saya, the real black panther, and his rise to power.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill.

programme.title: Ultimate Predator
programme.desc: Jaws of Death. What do you get when you mix hippos, bears, crocs and vipers? A heaping pile of animals with a vicious streak. People who have come face to face with animals on the rampage share their horrific stories.

programme.title: Desert Lions
programme.sub-title: Desert Lions: Surviving At Skeleton Coast
programme.desc: In this true story, lion researcher Dr. Philip Stander follows three orphaned lion cubs from birth to adulthood as they navigate the complexity of survival in one of the worlds most unforgiving environments, Namibias deadly Skeleton Coast. He gets up close and personal to unlock secrets of their world and witness the amazing adaptability of these special cats.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Snakes In the City Compilations
programme.desc: Hot Mambas. The black mamba is the most lethal snake in Africa. For tattooed snake catchers Simon Keys and Siouxsie Gillet, its the subject of some of their most hair-raising snake rescues.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: African Queens. In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen.

programme.title: Madagascars Legendary Lemurs
programme.desc: This island paradises towering limestone forests and lush bamboo grooves provide a home for these charismatic primates.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Tiny Jungle Queens. Under the rainforest canopy of Central America is a secret world ruled by insects. Two tiny queens will give everything to build their empires.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Africas Wild Side
programme.desc: This three-part docu-series takes a look at some of Botswanas most iconic and fascinating wildlife as they strive to survive and rasie their families. Each episode uses spectacular footage to focus on a particular aspect of the creatures struggle for life. One of the main driving forces in animal behaviour is the desire to procreate and ensure the continuity of the species and this is evident in the battles that males participate in for the right to mate with females. However, parenting skills can vary enormously with some animals being prepared to give up their own lives for their offspring while others are revealed to pose the greatest threat. The show also examines how the animals impact on the landscape by building paths and constructing homes.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Winter. Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Freaks and Creeps
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange. Along the way, she finds many other "odd ones" - animals that have come up with all kinds of strange adaptations so they can survive in the forest of Borneo. Lucy finds dung beetles in action - eating dung; frogs that fly; a tarsier, with eyes that are bigger than its brain; and the wooly bat that makes its home is a carnivorous plant

programme.title: Chinas Hidden Kingdoms
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Visiting forests, jungles, mountains and grasslands, we take a rare glimpse at parts of China that usually remain unseen. We see the wildlife that live amongst the stunning beauty of the Chinese landscapes - and how they survive in often demanding situations. With golden snub-nosed monkeys, bears, bees, elephants and the legendary giant panda. The Hidden Kingdoms of China is narrated by Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, hundreds of animals stranded on the rugged coast of Madagascar. Isolated from the mainland, they had to evolve at a rapid pace. Of the nearly quarter of a million animal species on the island, about 70 percent are unique. These myriad bizarre life forms had a huge impact on the first human settlers - one group of primates shaped their culture, resulting in folklore and legends that are still part of the islanders lives today.

programme.title: Matt Wright ja metsik loodus
programme.desc: Matt Wright presents his show Outback Wrangler revolving around Northern Territory of Australia. Matt tracks down, captures, and transports such dangerous animals as crocodiles, that are posing a threat to people. His goal is based on the preservation of wildlife: to remove and relocate problem animals rather than kill them. Crocodiles in Northern Australia have been under protection for more than 40 years, so now they have grown quite a lot and now they have to be protected from human encounter and vice versa.

He gets up close and personal to unlock secrets of their world and witness the amazing adaptability of these special cats.

programme.title: A Leopards Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambias Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. Shes just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, its a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies

programme.title: Chinas Hidden Kingdoms
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Visiting forests, jungles, mountains and grasslands, we take a rare glimpse at parts of China that usually remain unseen. We see the wildlife that live amongst the stunning beauty of the Chinese landscapes - and how they survive in often demanding situations. With golden snub-nosed monkeys, bears, bees, elephants and the legendary giant panda. The Hidden Kingdoms of China is narrated by Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, hundreds of animals stranded on the rugged coast of Madagascar. Isolated from the mainland, they had to evolve at a rapid pace. Of the nearly quarter of a million animal species on the island, about 70 percent are unique. These myriad bizarre life forms had a huge impact on the first human settlers - one group of primates shaped their culture, resulting in folklore and legends that are still part of the islanders lives today.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. programme.title: Doktor Pol

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: The sparse African Savannah can be a fearsome place for both herds of powerful prey and the lurking predators who hunt them down. In this captivating documentary series from National Geographic, the relationship between predator and prey is closely examined, exploring the fight for survival for both sets of animals. These herds are full of powerful or agile animals, making the job of a predator to feed itself and its family a troublesome task. But the African predators are ruthless and proficient hunters, and if a herd is infiltrated, or a straggling member is targeted, they will struggle to evade these savage carnivores.

programme.title: Tree Climbing Lions
programme.desc: These are no ordinary lions. Unique to this part of Africa, the prides in Queen Elizabeth National Park spend most of their lives in the trees.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Famous Tiger
programme.desc: Known as the Queen of Ranthambore, Machli is the most famous tiger in the world. The legendary tigress is a fearsome warrior known for her daring exploits. And shes the mother of an incredible four litters of cubs.
